name: Winter League Pullover
description: PS: ⭐️ I’m a Season 8 Knit Star! ⭐️ Shop this season’s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window April 21-30 here.
full_text: PS: ⭐️ I’m a Season 8 Knit Star! ⭐️ Shop this season’s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window April 21-30 here . A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here. The Winter League Pullover is a crewneck raglan sweater that evokes memories of chilly sports games, cozy winter evenings, and a general sense of nostalgia. The doubled ribbed neckband, v-insert neck triangle, and side slit details give personality and add to the classic appeal of this sweatshirt-inspired wardrobe staple. Meant to be well-loved and well-worn, this sweater has the perfect broken-in relaxed fit and deep raglans that allow for chic comfort and wearable ease. Shop the full kit here. SIZES Sizes XS (S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL) Suggested ease: 8-10”/20.5-25.5cm Pictured in a size S on model with 34”/86cm bust FINISHED DIMENSIONS Bust Circumference: 37.25”/95cm (42”/106.5cm, 43.5”/110.5cm, 48”/122cm, 51”/129.5cm, 55.5”/141.5cm, 60.25”/153cm, 63.25”/160.5cm) Length: 23”/58.5cm (23.5”/59.5cm, 24”/61cm, 24.5”/62cm, 25”/63.5cm, 25.5”/64.5cm, 26”/66cm, 26.5”/67.5cm) Sleeve Length: 18”/45.5cm (18”/45.5cm, 18.5”/47cm, 18.5”/47cm, 18.5”/47cm, 19”/48.5cm, 19”/48.5cm, 19”/48.5cm) DIFFICULTY LEVEL Intermediate SKILLS The knit stitch Purl stitch K2tog Ssk M1r M1l Traveling stitches Working in the round Picking up and knitting stitches Working a tubular bind off All patterns are written in standard US terms.
